Module OpenSocial::Auth
In: lib/opensocial/auth/base.rb

Provides helper classes to be used in verifying and validating the user. In particular, support is provided for:

  • Verification of signed makeRequest using OAuth/HMAC-SHA1 class ExampleController < ApplicationController 
      OpenSocial::Auth::CONSUMER_KEY = '623061448914'
  OpenSocial::Auth::CONSUMER_SECRET = 'uynAeXiWTisflWX99KU1D2q5'

  include OpenSocial::Auth

  before_filter :validate

  def return_private_data
  end

    end

  • Request for an OAuth request token
  • Request for an OAuth access token, when supplied with a request token

Methods

get_access_token   get_oauth_token   validate  

Public Instance methods

get_access_token(connection, token, secret)

If neccesary, swaps an existing request token and secret for an access token, storing it in the Connection class, and returning the access token and secret for later use.

get_oauth_token(key, secret, container, callback)

Gets an OAuth request token, and redirects the user to authorize the app to access data on their behalf.

validate(key = CONSUMER_KEY, secret = CONSUMER_SECRET)

Validates an incoming request by using the OAuth library and the supplied key and secret.

[Validate]
